content:
UPDATE: Issue resolved.

I went to the Firebird Toolbar > Help > Troubleshooting Information. Clicked the "Clear startup cache..." button. I was then able to readd my Gmail and access the account.

Hope this helps someone.
creator: ayersc3

content:
Use OAuth2 for the incoming outlook.office365.com, 993, SSL/TLS, and outgoing smtp.office365.com, 587, STARTTLS. But if you're using TB 115 with an older profile, you might have to remove some entries from Config. editor in Settings/General:

https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1814823#c0

content:
TB115 is now more completely based on HTML and CSS. As a result a user can override many of the default layouts, such as the location of that toolbar, by using custom CSS statements loaded into a user file which the program will read upon startup.

See this earlier reply
creator: mjh

content:
Sorry you are having trouble. Definitely it has been tested.

Your first screen shot is what is called "Account Central" it's not a setup page, but an area for you to do account related actions. We expect that to be displayed when clicking on the account in the folder pane, and should have also worked that way in version 102. If it didn't then something was installed which broke it.

In your other screen shots I see a lot of nstmp-nn "folders" which suggests a problem. Are you sure all those accounts are successfully logged in?
creator: wsmwk

content:
The area with search is a new "Unified Toolbar." It is configurable but it behaves slightly differently than the old toolbar - you must click "Save" after right+click > Customize. Please see https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/unified-toolbar

We are exploring incorporating the menu bar into the toolbar.
creator: wsmwk

content: Does Help > Troubleshoot Mode help?
creator: wsmwk

content:
Try this: 

/* appmenu location */  #button-appmenu {  order:-1 !important;   color: black !important;  }


I found the ID by opening the Developer Toolbox, clicking the arrow at the upper left end, then clicking the menu icon (see picture).

Help/Troubleshooting Info, Profile Folder, Open Folder, close TB, create a new folder named chrome, create a new document in chrome with a text editor, name it userChrome.css, Save as type: All files *.*, copy in the above code, change the colour as desired. Double-click toolkit.legacyUserProfileCustomizations.stylesheets to true in Settings/General/Config. editor, restart TB.

Online css generator
creator: sfhowes

content:
Pred Supernovou bol návrat k staršej verzii Thunderbirdu možný veľmi jednoducho. Stiahnite si potrebnú oficiálnu verziu Thunderbirdu. Vypnite Thunderbird a natvrdo preinštalujte doterajšiu (problémovú) verziu Thunderbirdu. Všetky oficiálne verzie Thunderbirdu nájdete tuna: http://archive.mozilla.org/pub/thunderbird/releases/

Po nainštalovaní vypnite automatické aktualizácie: - Thunderbird - Nástroje - Možnosti - Spresnenie - Aktualizacie A tu zvoľte „Nevyhľadávať aktualizácie“

Treba vyskúšať. Odporúčam najskôr si niekam zálohovať (prekopírujte) súčasný profil Thunderbirdu, ktorý nájdete tuná: Thunderbord - Pomocník - Informácie pre riešenie problémov - Priečinok profilu - a tu kliknite na dlaždicu "Otvoriť priečinok"

content:
This can be done with css: 

/* height of threads pane */ #threadPane {   min-height: 75px !important; }


Help/Troubleshooting Info, Profile Folder, Open Folder, close TB, create a new folder named chrome, create a new document in chrome with a text editor, name it userChrome.css, Save as type: All files *.*, copy in the above code, change the number as desired. Double-click toolkit.legacyUserProfileCustomizations.stylesheets to true in Settings/General/Config. editor, restart TB.

Online css generator
creator: sfhowes

content: You must accept cookies in TB Settings/Privacy & Security, Web Content, for OAuth2 authentication to store a token in Saved Passwords.

content:
Version 115 has a completely different layout.

See below.

You can still add things to the toolbar which is now above the menu bar. Just as I have done here by right clicking the bar and selecting customize. Just be aware there are now multiple bars depending on the scope of the tab. so you might have to add say the write button to the mail, Address book, Calendar, Tasks, chat and settings tab as you would expect a mail program to be able to start to compose a new mail regardless of where you are in the program.
creator: MattAuSupport

content: In addition to 'Latin' you may also need to change 'Fonts for': Other Writing Systems Adjust the font sizes accordingly if the numbers for 'Latin' work for your.
